snippet: Contradicting early French reports, officials said French forces had been involved in direct ground combat since just after landing last week.

byline.original: By ADAM NOSSITER, NEIL MacFARQUHAR and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Adam Nossiter reported from Bamako, Neil MacFarquhar from the United Nations, and Alan Cowell from Paris. Steven Erlanger and Marlise Simons contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Contradicting early French reports, officials said French forces had been involved in direct ground combat since just after landing last week.

headline.seo: On the Ground in Mali, France Sends Reinforcements to Confront Islamist Forces
headline.main: France Sends Reinforcements to Confront Islamist Forces in Mali
headline.print_headline: On the Ground in Mali, France Sends Reinforcements to Confront Islamist Forces
